author: rhuijben
msg: Call the interactive conflict resolver in the update editor only after
a file or directory is added, instead of sometimes before *and* after
Currently the interactive conflict resolver doesn't allow to resolve
these tree conflicts at this stage, but if that is fixed this patch
is relevant. ('svn' doesn't even use this hook, as it prefers to handle
all conflicts when the operation is done)
(add_directory): Don't invoke resolver here. Just stash conflict.
(add_file): Fix some pool usages (one interesting). Don't invoke

author: uiterlix
msg: Added documentation to be added to the website on release.

author: markrmiller
msg: Add a 5.0 note that allows us the right to add zk=truth improvements during 5.x by default.

author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-6920, SOLR-6640: A replicated index can end up corrupted when small files end up with the same file name and size.

author: markrmiller
msg: Add a 5.0 note that allows us the right to add zk=truth improvements during 5.x by default.
